code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3001';function BackgroundSelector(_ref){let{onSelect}=_ref;const[backgrounds,setBackgrounds]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetchBackgrounds();},[]);const fetchBackgrounds=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/api/backgrounds"));setBackgrounds(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Failed to fetch backgrounds:',error);}finally{setLoading(false);}};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading backgrounds..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"background-selector",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Choose Your Marathon Location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"background-grid",children:backgrounds.map(bg=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"background-card",onClick:()=>onSelect(bg),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(API_URL).concat(bg.thumbnail),alt:bg.name,className:"background-thumbnail"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:bg.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:bg.description})]},bg.id))})]});}export default BackgroundSelector;
